events.description: when page changes via user interaction or programmatically

args.description: Selected page number (starting with 1), or null if no page found

events.description: when page changes via user interaction

slots.name: first-text
slots.description: The "go to first page" button text. Optionally scoped

slots.description: The "go to previous page" button text. Optionally scoped

slots.name: last-text
slots.description: The "go to last page" button text. Optionally scoped

slots.name: page
slots.description: The page number button button content. Always scoped
